headline: Comcast (CMCSA) Stock Sinks As Market Gains: Here's Why

headline: 8x8 Appoints Mary Murray as Country Lead for Ireland, Strengthening Local Commitment and Growth
summary: DUBLIN, September 18, 2025--8x8, Inc. (NASDAQ: EGHT) has appointed Mary Murray as Operations Director and Country Lead for Ireland.
